Class OrderControllerImpl

java.lang.Object
io.fusion.air.microservice.server.controllers.AbstractController
io.fusion.air.microservice.adapters.controllers.open.OrderControllerImpl
@CrossOrigin @Configuration @Validated @RestController @RequestMapping("${service.api.path}/order") @RequestScope public class OrderControllerImpl extends AbstractController
Order Controller to Save the Order and Process the Payments. This is to demonstrate certain concepts in Exception Handling ONLY. Order, Product, Cart all must be part of 3 different Microservices.
Version:
1.0
Author:
arafkarsh

    • processPayments

      @PostMapping("/processPayments") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<StandardResponse> processPayments(@RequestBody PaymentDetails _payDetails)
      Process the Payment To Demonstrate Exception Handling. The Error Code for the Exceptions will be automatically determined by the Framework. Error Code Prefix will be Different for Each Microservice.
